1.content:
Okay - So we got Dylan, Hero of Storms and, Light
- And Link, Hero of Seasons, and Time

Who do you choose and where to start with?
1.title: Choose the Victim!

info.brief_description: Dylan(My Zelda oc) and Link run into a few problems, and get.. Well, big.
info.description:
Okay, so here's another story I came up with - My Zelda OC Dylan, and Of course - Link, go out in town, and when they arrive they notice sone big changes to the Hyrule Castle Town. And soon discover they're about to feel the same changes as well - in their bodies.

NOTE: The weight gain must either be focused on Dylan and/or Link
I will allow magic
I will allow homo stuff, as long as it doesn't get too homo
You can't kill them
Have fun
200 GP to whoever adds chapters
info.pretty_title: LoZ: Link and Dylan: A big Problem
